name: dig
description: 域名系统(DNS)查询工具，用于查询DNS服务器获取域名解析信息。

options.description: Display complete list of options (use "dig -h | more" for pagination)
Specify global DNS server to query (e.g., @8.8.8.8)
Specify local DNS server to query for the corresponding host
Target domain name to query (e.g., example.com)
Specify DNS query type (e.g., A, AAAA, MX, TXT, NS, CNAME)
Specify DNS query class (default: IN, other values include CH, HS)
Query-specific options (see "dig -h" for complete details)
Global DNS options (see "dig -h" for complete details)
Local DNS options for the corresponding host (see "dig -h" for complete details)
Target host to query (can be a domain name or IP address for reverse lookup)

name: host
description: 用于DNS查询的工具，可获取主机名对应的IP地址或域名相关的DNS记录信息
syntax:
host [-aCdilrTvVw] [-c class] [-N ndots] [-t type] [-W time] [-R number] [-m flag] [-p port] hostname [server]
host -h (illegal, use --help reference)

options.description: Equivalent to -v -t ANY
Like -a but omits RRSIG, NSEC, NSEC3
Specifies query class for non-IN data
Compares SOA records on authoritative nameservers
Equivalent to -v
Lists all hosts in a domain, using AXFR
Set memory debugging flag (trace|record|usage)
Changes the number of dots allowed before root lookup is done
Specifies the port on the server to query
Disables recursive processing
Specifies number of retries for UDP packets
A SERVFAIL response should stop query
Specifies the query type
Enables TCP/IP mode
Enables UDP mode
Enables verbose output
Print version number and exit
Specifies to wait forever for a reply
Specifies how long to wait for a reply
Use IPv4 query transport only
Use IPv6 query transport only

name: nslookup
description: DNS查询工具，用于查询域名解析信息，支持交互式操作。

options.description: interactive mode using server
just look up host using default server
just look up host using server
